document.full_text: the u.s. health regulator on wednesday approved astrazeneca plc's medullary thyroid cancer drug, vandetanib, the first treatment to be approved for the rare form of cancer.
document.title: fda approves astrazeneca's thyroid cancer drug
lines_and_colors: the u.s. health regulator on wednesday approved astrazeneca plc's medullary thyroid cancer drug, vandetanib, the first treatment to be approved for the rare form of cancer.
